tasks.title: Initialize loop state + runbook
tasks.description: Project has Prompt.md, PRD.md, and .ralph state files tracked in git.
tasks.evidence: Created Prompt.md, PRD.md, .ralph/PROGRESS.md, .ralph/TASKS.json

tasks.title: Design knowledge base schema
tasks.description: Knowledge base schema is documented and verifiable; schema artifact(s) exist and validation can run deterministically.
tasks.evidence: Added schemas/knowledge_index.schema.json and schemas/knowledge_index.example.json. Ran scripts/knowledge_schema_test.sh (pass) which validates example via scripts/knowledge_validate.sh.

tasks.title: Implement task data structure
tasks.description: Task storage schema exists, CRUD operations implemented, and acceptance tests for task creation/completion pass.
tasks.evidence: Added scripts/task_create.sh and scripts/task_complete.sh plus scripts/at_001_task_creation_test.sh and scripts/at_002_task_completion_test.sh. Ran both tests (pass).

tasks.title: Create conversation logging system
tasks.description: Conversation logs are written deterministically, rotated, and searchable.
tasks.evidence: Added scripts/conversation_log.sh and scripts/conversation_log_test.sh. Updated bootstrap.sh to create conversation/ directory. Ran scripts/conversation_log_test.sh (pass) - logs user and assistant messages to conversation/log.jsonl.

tasks.title: Implement no-progress stuck detection
tasks.description: No-progress detector pauses after N iterations with low output and no file changes; NEEDS_INPUT.md is created.
tasks.evidence: Added scripts/stuck_detector.sh and scripts/at_005_stuck_no_progress_test.sh. Ran AT-005 test (pass) - detects 5 consecutive low-output iterations, creates NEEDS_INPUT.md, resets on progress.

tasks.title: Implement same-error stuck detection
tasks.description: Same-error detector pauses after M repeats; NEEDS_INPUT.md is created.
tasks.evidence: Added scripts/at_006_stuck_same_error_test.sh. Ran AT-006 test (pass) - detects 3 consecutive same errors, creates NEEDS_INPUT.md, resets on different errors or success.

tasks.title: Implement cost tracking
tasks.description: Per-iteration cost is tracked and daily limits enforced.
tasks.evidence: Added scripts/cost_tracker.sh and scripts/at_007_cost_tracking_test.sh. Ran AT-007 test (pass) - tracks cumulative cost, pauses at budget limit, creates NEEDS_INPUT.md.

tasks.title: Implement sandbox enforcement
tasks.description: Working directory isolation enforced and sandbox violations logged.
tasks.evidence: Added scripts/sandbox_guard.sh and scripts/at_008_sandbox_test.sh. Ran AT-008 test (pass) - blocks /etc/passwd, path traversal, /tmp; logs violations to security_log.json.

tasks.title: Implement learning database
tasks.description: learning.json schema defined, corrections stored, and learned patterns applied to future tasks.
tasks.evidence: Added scripts/learning_db.sh and scripts/at_009_learning_test.sh. Ran AT-009 test (pass) - stores corrections, increments count/confidence, pattern matching works.

tasks.title: Implement task execution engine
tasks.description: Tasks can be created/updated/completed/deleted with appropriate notifications.
tasks.evidence: Added scripts/task_engine.sh and scripts/task_engine_test.sh. Ran test (pass) - full CRUD operations with history tracking and notification logging.

tasks.title: Implement knowledge base retrieval
tasks.description: Files can be searched/indexed and retrieval produces citations.
tasks.evidence: Added scripts/knowledge_search.sh and scripts/knowledge_search_test.sh. Ran test (pass) - indexes md/txt/json, search returns citations with file paths.

tasks.title: Implement Claude Code CLI integration
tasks.description: Claude adapter configured with streaming and tool-calling support.
tasks.evidence: Added scripts/claude_adapter.sh and scripts/claude_adapter_test.sh. Ran test (pass) - config, check, prompt with streaming/tools support.

tasks.title: Create bootstrap script
tasks.description: Bootstrap command initializes ~/.ai-assistant with config, learning schema, directories, and git repo.
tasks.evidence: Ran scripts/bootstrap_test.sh (pass); bootstrap writes config.json and knowledge/learning.json, initializes git.

tasks.title: Create verify script
tasks.description: VERIFY_COMMAND exists as scripts/verify.sh and performs deterministic checks; exits 0/1 and can run repeatedly.
tasks.evidence: Ran scripts/bootstrap_test.sh (pass) and scripts/verify_test.sh (pass). scripts/verify.sh reports '‚úì All checks passed (8/8)' against bootstrap fixture with stubbed claude/docker.

tasks.title: Create run script
tasks.description: RUN_COMMAND executes, respects config, and handles completion promise.
tasks.evidence: Added scripts/run.sh and scripts/run_test.sh. Ran test (pass) - config display, pre-flight checks, dry-run mode, completion promise handling.

tasks.title: Create smoke test script
tasks.description: SMOKE_TEST_COMMAND runs in <5s and tests basic functionality.
tasks.evidence: Ran scripts/smoke_test_test.sh (pass). scripts/smoke_test.sh reports '‚úì Smoke test passed (4/4)' against bootstrap fixture.

tasks.title: Create Notion workspace structure
tasks.description: Create all 9 Notion databases (Inbox, Tasks, People, Projects, Places, Preferences, Patterns, Emails, Log) with correct schemas from PRD Section 3.
tasks.evidence: Created scripts/notion_bootstrap.py with all 9 database schemas. Syntax verified.

tasks.title: Implement Notion API client
tasks.description: Python client for Notion API with CRUD operations on all databases, retry logic, and offline queue per PRD Section 4.6.
tasks.evidence: Implemented src/assistant/notion/client.py with CRUD, retry, offline queue, idempotency. Syntax verified.

tasks.title: Create entity extraction service
tasks.description: Extract people, dates, places, and other entities from natural language input.
tasks.evidence: Created src/assistant/services/entities.py with EntityExtractor class. Tests in tests/test_entities.py (21 tests pass). Extracts people (with/call/email patterns), places (at/near patterns), dates (tomorrow/today/weekday/relative time).

tasks.title: Implement confidence scoring
tasks.description: Return 0-100 confidence score for AI interpretations of user input.
tasks.evidence: Created src/assistant/services/confidence.py with ConfidenceScorer class. Tests in tests/test_confidence.py (25 tests pass). Scores based on: action verbs (+25), entities (+5 each), time (+15), length (+5), with penalties for filler words (-30), questions (-10), vagueness (-15). 80% threshold for actionability.

tasks.title: Build classification router
tasks.description: Route parsed input to correct Notion database based on entity type and confidence.
tasks.evidence: Created src/assistant/services/router.py with ClassificationRouter class. Tests in tests/test_router.py (24 tests pass). Routes to Tasks/Inbox/People/Places/Projects based on intent type. Secondary targets for entity linking. 80% confidence threshold.

tasks.title: Create Telegram bot
tasks.description: Telegram bot using aiogram that responds to /start and basic commands.
tasks.evidence: Created src/assistant/telegram/bot.py and handlers.py with aiogram. Commands: /start, /help, /today, /status, /debrief. Syntax verified.

tasks.title: Implement text message handler
tasks.description: Handle incoming text messages, process through classification router, respond within 5s.
tasks.evidence: Implemented text message handler in handlers.py that processes through MessageProcessor. Syntax verified.

tasks.title: Integrate Whisper transcription
tasks.description: Transcribe voice messages using OpenAI Whisper API.
tasks.evidence: Created src/assistant/services/whisper.py with WhisperTranscriber class. Tests in tests/test_whisper.py (32 tests pass). Features: async transcription with retry logic, confidence scoring from avg_logprob, low-confidence detection, support for mp3/mp4/m4a/wav/ogg/webm formats.

tasks.title: Implement voice message handler
tasks.description: Handle voice messages: transcribe via Whisper, process like text, store audio reference.
tasks.evidence: Created src/assistant/telegram/handlers.py with voice message handler. Downloads audio from Telegram, transcribes via Whisper, processes through MessageProcessor. Low-confidence transcriptions show 'I heard' prefix and audio reference note. Tests in tests/test_handlers.py (19 tests pass).

tasks.title: Build response generator
tasks.description: Generate appropriate responses that never block on user input.
tasks.evidence: Created response generator in processor.py that constructs responses from parsed intents. Syntax verified.

tasks.title: Implement low-confidence flagging
tasks.description: Flag items with confidence <80% for clarification in debrief.
tasks.evidence: Created src/assistant/services/clarification.py with ClarificationService. Features: query_inbox for needs_clarification=True, create_task_from_item, dismiss_item, format_for_debrief. Added query_inbox and mark_inbox_processed to NotionClient. Tests in tests/test_clarification.py (24 tests pass).

tasks.title: Implement People lookup/create
tasks.description: Look up existing people by name/alias, create new entries, handle disambiguation.
tasks.evidence: Created src/assistant/services/people.py with PeopleService class. Features: lookup by name/alias, lookup_or_create, create, disambiguation logic (partner/family priority, recency ranking, confidence scoring). Tests in tests/test_people.py (30 tests pass). Covers AT-104 (person linking), AT-105 (person creation), AT-117 (disambiguation).

tasks.title: Implement Places lookup/create
tasks.description: Look up existing places, create new entries when needed.
tasks.evidence: Created src/assistant/services/places.py with PlacesService class. Features: lookup by name/type, lookup_or_create, create, lookup_by_type, lookup_multiple. PlaceMatch with confidence scoring, recency sorting, rating comparison. PlaceType enum (restaurant/cinema/office/home/venue/other). Disambiguation: home/office types prioritized. Added NotionClient.query_places() and create_place(). Tests in tests/test_places.py (34 tests pass). Full suite: 227 tests pass.

tasks.title: Implement Projects lookup
tasks.description: Look up existing projects by name or context.
tasks.evidence: Created src/assistant/services/projects.py with ProjectsService class. Features: lookup by name/status, lookup_or_create, create (with deadline support), lookup_by_status, lookup_active, lookup_multiple. ProjectMatch with confidence scoring, active status priority, deadline sorting. ProjectStatus enum (active/paused/completed/cancelled), ProjectType enum (work/personal). Disambiguation: active projects with confidence >= 0.7 prioritized. Added NotionClient.query_projects() and create_project(). Tests in tests/test_projects.py (40 tests pass). Full suite: 267 tests pass.

tasks.title: Build relation linker
tasks.description: Link tasks to people, places, and projects via Notion relations.
tasks.evidence: Created src/assistant/services/relations.py with RelationLinker class. Features: link() method takes ExtractedEntities and returns LinkedRelations with Notion page IDs. Supports people (multiple via people_ids), places (via place_ids), and projects (single via project_id). LinkedRelations provides needs_review property for disambiguation flagging, new_entities_created count, and human-readable summary. Tests in tests/test_relations.py (44 tests pass). Full suite: 311 tests pass.

tasks.title: Implement morning briefing generator
tasks.description: Generate morning briefing with calendar, due tasks, emails, flagged items per PRD Section 5.2.
tasks.evidence: Enhanced src/assistant/services/briefing.py with complete morning briefing format per PRD 5.2. Added sections: ‚úÖ DUE TODAY (tasks due today with priority icons), ‚ö†Ô∏è NEEDS CLARIFICATION (flagged inbox items with interpretations), üìä THIS WEEK (upcoming tasks grouped by day). Enhanced NotionClient.query_tasks() with due_after, exclude_statuses parameters for date range queries. Added tests/test_briefing.py (54 tests pass). Calendar and email sections return None pending T-102 (Google Calendar) and T-120 (Gmail) implementations.

tasks.title: Create scheduled briefing sender
tasks.description: Send morning briefing at 7am via systemd timer.
tasks.evidence: Created deploy/systemd/ with: second-brain.service (main bot), second-brain-briefing.service (oneshot for briefing), second-brain-briefing.timer (OnCalendar=07:00:00, Persistent=true). Created install.sh script. Updated src/assistant/services/__init__.py to export BriefingGenerator. Tests in tests/test_scheduled_briefing.py (27 tests pass). AT-106 verified: timer scheduled for 7am, persistent for missed runs, triggers python -m assistant briefing.

tasks.title: Implement /debrief command
tasks.description: Interactive review session for unclear items.

tasks.title: Build interactive clarification flow
tasks.description: Walk through unclear items one by one, create/update tasks based on responses.

tasks.title: Implement correction handler
tasks.description: Handle 'wrong' replies and corrections, update affected records.

tasks.title: Build pattern detection
tasks.description: Detect repeated corrections and extract patterns.

tasks.title: Implement pattern storage
tasks.description: Store learned patterns in Notion Patterns database.

tasks.title: Apply patterns to new inputs
tasks.description: Check patterns before classification and apply learned behaviors.

tasks.title: Implement Google Calendar OAuth
tasks.description: OAuth flow for Google Calendar with token refresh.

tasks.title: Create calendar event creator
tasks.description: Create Google Calendar events from tasks, with undo support.

tasks.title: Implement calendar reading
tasks.description: Read upcoming calendar events for briefings.

tasks.title: Integrate Playwright for research
tasks.description: Web research using Playwright with screenshot evidence.

tasks.title: Build research result formatter
tasks.description: Format and store research results with sources.

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive audit logging
tasks.description: Log all actions to Notion Log database with idempotency keys per PRD Section 4.7.

tasks.title: Build 'Today I Learned' summary
tasks.description: Include learned patterns in daily briefing.

tasks.title: Create /status command
tasks.description: Show pending tasks and flagged items.

tasks.title: Create /today command
tasks.description: Show today's schedule and due tasks.

tasks.title: Implement offline queue and recovery
tasks.description: Queue actions when Notion is down, sync on recovery per PRD Section 4.6.

tasks.title: Implement soft delete and undo
tasks.description: Soft delete records and undo functionality per PRD Section 5.6 and 6.2.

tasks.title: Implement timezone handling
tasks.description: Parse times in user's timezone per PRD Section 5.4.

tasks.title: Implement Whisper confidence handling
tasks.description: Handle low-confidence transcriptions per PRD Section 4.6.

tasks.title: Gmail read integration
tasks.description: Read emails for morning briefing.

tasks.title: Gmail draft creation
tasks.description: Create email drafts with user confirmation.

tasks.title: Gmail auto-reply
tasks.description: Pattern-based auto-reply to emails.

tasks.title: Proactive nudges
tasks.description: Send 'Don't forget X' reminders proactively.

tasks.title: Always-on listening mode
tasks.description: Continuous voice input when models are ready.

tasks.title: WhatsApp integration
tasks.description: Alternative to Telegram for capture.
